puzzles.name: Shadow Whisper
puzzles.description: Look closely at the candle shadows together they reveal the secret word.

puzzles.name: Whisperlight Count
puzzles.description: In this dim room, the candles gather in two places on the table and at the hearth. Count each group in order to reveal the code.

puzzles.name: Haunted Arrangement
puzzles.description: Some of the portraits are not where they should be… how many stare from the wrong place?

puzzles.name: Haunted Reflection
puzzles.description: Three ballroom mirrors show different scenes; only one keeps moving when the lights die.

puzzles.name: The Spill That Speaks
puzzles.description: The fallen glass left more than water. The spill is outline reveals the cellars code.

puzzles.name: Missing Reflection
puzzles.description: Two mirrors face the room, yet neither shows a soul. Write what should appear… but does not.

hints.hintText: Swap the portraits so the plaques climb from the oldest year to the newest.
Only one mirror shows motion after the ballroom goes quiet.
Sweep the braid of ash from left to right to reveal the etched digits.
The chant repeats its last word—listen until the echo settles.
